mapper.select: select user.id, user.nick, user.avatar from t_user_subscription subscription inner join t_user user on user.id = subscription.author_id and user.is_delete = 0 where subscription.is_delete = 0 and subscription.user_id = #{userId} order by subscription.create_time desc

SELECT user.id, user.nick, user.avatar FROM t_user_subscription subscription INNER JOIN t_user user ON user.id = subscription.user_id AND user.is_delete = 0 -- 改为 user_id（订阅者） WHERE subscription.is_delete = 0 AND subscription.author_id = #{userId} -- 查询“谁订阅了我” ORDER BY subscription.create_time DESC
